feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VCSA upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 25, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 28, 16:00 UTC

Jul 14, 01:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 25/07/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 28/07/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Only the VCSA management will be impacted during maintenance. Your VMs will continue to function, as will the hosts, storage and network.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement, we will be updating vCenter Server Appliance.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] Switch Upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 22, 04:00 - 07:00 UTC

Jul 8, 02:41 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/07/2022 04:00 UTC
End time : 22/07/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact : A few seconds of Input/Output freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times)
Service improvement : The objective of this change is to upgrade the switch version to maintain consistency.

Service Impact : The storage of these pools were temporarily unavailable pcc-003903 pcc-003904 pcc-007319 pcc-008900 pcc-010170 pcc-010706 pcc-012185 pcc-012195 pcc-012218 pcc-012221
Root cause : Hardware issue

entry.title: [Global][Hosted private cloud] - Maintenance upgrade host
entry.content:
Jul 8, 18:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 4, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 23, 22:52 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/07/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 08/07/2022 18:00 UTC
Description:
Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Vms will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted .
If major update have to be done, it will be two successive reboots like this:
Host v6.0 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.5 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.7 : upgrade minor to the last build 19195723 if needed, reboot.
If hosts are already on 19195723, they will be skipped.
Service impact : If we meet an issue during the reboot of the host , it will be replaced. (20 min)
Service improvement : All hosts have to be upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility and also due to the CVE.
We will only enterprise customers with VSAN hosts.
the boot order will be checked
89 hosts
Service impact : Hosts will be rebooted.
Service improvement: All hosts have to be upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility and also due to the CVE.

entry.title: [Global][Hosted private cloud] - Maintenance upgrade host - wave 18
entry.content:
Jul 8, 16:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 22, 13:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/07/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 06/07/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Up to three reboot and if we meet an issue during the reboot of the host, it will be replaced. (20 min)
Service improvement : All hosts are upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility.

If you are from wave 18 you will receive a mail from us and you will be able to schedule again with the manager.
Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Vms will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted .
If major update have to be done, it will be two successive reboots like this:
Host v6.0 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.5 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.7 : upgrade minor to the last build 19195723 if needed, reboot.
If hosts are already on 19195723, they will be skipped

entry.title: [Worldwide][Hosted Private Cloud] - Delivery and Spare Host

Jul 6, 15:37 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/07/2022 07:00 UTC
End Time : 06/07/2022 15:20 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : All Zone
Root cause :

Jul 6, 13:48 UTC
Identified - Root cause : After investigation carried out by our teams, the root cause of this incident was a software issue.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently drafting a fix. We will get back to you as soon as the fix is being deployed.

Jul 6, 12:45 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 06/07/2022 07:00 UTC
User impact : The functionality addHost is currently unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : allZone
Scope of impact : Delivery and Spare Host
